caption.p: The effects of different doses of AG (1, 5 and 10 μM) with specific induction medium (IM) of each differentiation type on tri-lineage differentiation potentials of cells from SPFP-MSCs on day 21 compared with specific induction medium without AG as control. The scale bar (▬▬) in ( A, B, D– F) represents 500 µm and 200 µm, respectively. ( A) Osteogenic differentiation; Alizarin red S staining reflected that the calcium droplets. ( B) Adipogenic differentiation; Oil Red O staining reflected that lipid droplets. ( C) Chondrogenic differentiation; After a cell pellet was treated with chondrogenic medium and chondrogenic medium with AG. ( D) Pellet cultures of SPFP-MSCs were sectioned and stained with Hematoxylin & Eosin reflected that morphology. ( E) Pellet cultures of SPFP-MSCs were sectioned and stained with toluidine blue reflected that glycosaminoglycans. ( F) Pellet cultures of SPFP-MSCs were sectioned and stained with alcian blue reflected that proteoglycans.
